A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was not completely horrible but you can tell that JJ Abrahams and Ryan Johnson never talked about what will happen in this new trilogy. The result is from a narrativ standpoint: a mess. There were so many buildups in this and the previous movie\, that just went to nothing. I can personally not understand how this movie has such high ratings even though it was a huge mess and had so many plot holes.
